sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Mail, Book, Hash, School, LogOut, Camera, Edit2 } from 'lucide-react'; const Profile = ({ user, theme, onLogout }) => { const isDark = theme === 'dark'; const styles = { container: { padding: '30px', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#0f172a' : '#f8fafc', minHeight: '100vh', fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif", color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, // Banner & Header banner: { height: '180px', borderRadius: '20px', background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #6366f1 0%, #8b5cf6 100%)', position: 'relative', marginBottom: '60px' }, avatarWrapper: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '-50px', left: '40px', padding: '5px', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#0f172a' : '#f8fafc', borderRadius: '50%' }, avatar: { width: '120px', height: '120px', borderRadius: '50%', objectFit: 'cover', border: '4px solid #fff' }, headerInfo: { marginLeft: '180px', paddingTop: '10px' }, name: { fontSize: '28px', fontWeight: '800' }, roleBadge: { backgroundColor: '#e0e7ff', color: '#4338ca', padding: '5px 12px', borderRadius: '20px', fontSize: '12px', fontWeight: 'bold', textTransform: 'uppercase', marginLeft: '10px', display: 'inline-block', verticalAlign: 'middle' }, // Content Grid grid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr))', gap: '25px', marginTop: '30px' }, card: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', padding: '25px', borderRadius: '16px', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.02)' }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '20px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '10px' }, // Rows row: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '15px', paddingBottom: '15px', borderBottom: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #f1f5f9' }, iconBox: { width: '40px', height: '40px', borderRadius: '10px', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#334155' : '#f3f4f6', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', marginRight: '15px', color: '#6366f1' }, label: { fontSize: '13px', color: '#94a3b8', marginBottom: '2px' }, value: { fontSize: '15px', fontWeight: '600' }, logoutBtn: { backgroundColor: '#fee2e2', color: '#ef4444', border: 'none', padding: '12px 25px', borderRadius: '10px', fontWeight: 'bold', cursor: 'pointer', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '8px', marginTop: '20px' } }; return (
{/* Banner Area */}
{/* Header Info (Name & Role) */}

{user.name}

{user.role}

Computer Science Enthusiast | {user.college}

{/* Personal Details Card */}
Personal Details
Email Address
{user.email}
College Name
{user.college}
{/* Academic Details Card */}
Academic Info
Department
{user.department || "Not Set"}
{user.role === 'teacher' ? 'Employee ID' : 'Roll Number'}
{user.rollNo || "Not Set"}
); }; export default Profile;
